doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Anisul Haque is a Neurologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, PhD, FCPS (Medicine), FRCP (Edin). He is a Former Professor & Chairman, Neurology Department at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Anisul Haque at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi is 12pm to 6pm (Tue, Wed & Thursday), 3pm to 6pm (Saturday).
